live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
Hydro continues to work to restore power.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38171.title: June 06 – Winnipeg (Saint Vital surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve this as soon as possible.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38162.summary: are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
